decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location plan and 001 received on 05/01/2016. 002 rev 001 received on 24/02/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - The waste and recycled materials storage arrangements shown on the approved drawing shall be completed before any part of the accommodation hereby permitted is occupied.

Condition : 5 - Notwithstanding the submitted plans, full details of the proposed parking layout including swept path analysis shall be submitted and agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The agreed details shall be implemented prior to the first beneficial use of the extensions and so maintained at all times thereafter.

Condition : 6 - Notwithstanding the submitted plans full details of the proposed cycle store shall be submitted and approved prior to the first beneficial occupation of the extensions hereby approved and this shall be so maintained at all times thereafter.

Condition : 7 - Prior to the commencement of development on site and notwithstanding the plans hereby approved, details of the privacy screening shown on plan reference 002 rev 001 shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.  The details, as approved, shall be installed maintained as such at all times thereafter prior to first use of the balcony
Condition : 8 - The commercial floorspace hereby approved shall be used only ancillary to the main commercial unit fronting Staines Road and shall not be used for any other purpose.
description: Erection of rear roof extensions with Juliette balconies and front roof windows, a part two part single storey rear extension and alterations to the front elevation at ground floor to both properties
